name: Jason A. D. Atkin
content: People look-up - The University of Nottingham UK China Malaysia Main Menu Study About Research Business News Visit A–Z Search You are here: University of NottinghamComputer SciencePeople School of Computer Science HomeAbout the SchoolStudy with usResearchInternshipsWork with usEquality Diversity and Inclusion People Honorary appointments EventsNewsContact us Print Email this Page Student Intranet Jason AtkinAssociate Professor, Faculty of Science Download to vCardBack to the Staff Directory Personal DetailsLink to my web pagePublications Contact workRoom C83 Computer ScienceJubilee CampusWollaton RoadNottinghamNG8 1BBUKjason.atkin@nottingham.ac.ukhttp://www.cs.nott.ac.uk/~pszja BiographyHaving graduated with a BSc Hons in 'Mathematics with Computing', followed by successfully completing a PGCE to teach Secondary School Maths and IT, I worked for around 10 years in industry, as a software engineer, team leader and software consultant, before doing a PhD in Computer Science at the University of Nottingham. Following my PhD I spent about four years as a researcher, working on airport optimisation problems, before obtaining an academic position in the School of Computer Science. I am currently an Associate Professor in the same School at Nottingham. My current research involves ongoing airport and airspace modelling and optimisation work, as well as More Electric Aircraft power flow and supervisory controller optimisation work, particularly in the area of automated and optimised system and controller design.Recent Publications PINHEIRO, RODRIGO LANKAITES, LANDA-SILVA, DARIO and ATKIN, JASON, 2017.
